General.Name: Thonburi Medical Centre Public Company Limited
General.Description: Thonburi Medical Centre Public Company Limited engages in operation of hospital business in Thailand. It offers services comprising hair treatment, weight control, facial treatment, non-surgical facelift, anti-aging, sexual health, cosmetic surgery, and laser hair removal. The company was formerly known as Krungdhon Hospital Public Company Limited and changed its name to Thonburi Medical Centre Public Company Limited in April 2013. Thonburi Medical Centre Public Company Limited was founded in 1977 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
General.Address: 337, Somdet Prachao Taksin Road, Bangkok, Thailand, 10600
